title: Implement content moderation for polite language across platform

requirements.text: Add content validation to profile bio field that checks for inappropriate language before allowing profile creation or updates
acceptanceCriteria: Profile bio submissions are validated for inappropriate language
Inappropriate content in bios is rejected with a clear error message
Valid bios pass through without modification

requirements.text: Add content validation to reel description field that checks for inappropriate language before allowing reel uploads
acceptanceCriteria: Reel descriptions are validated for inappropriate language
Inappropriate content in descriptions is rejected with a clear error message
Valid descriptions pass through without modification

requirements.text: Update ProfileSetupModal and ProfileEditForm components to display user-friendly error messages when content validation fails
acceptanceCriteria: Validation errors are displayed clearly to users
Error messages guide users to correct their content
Form submission is prevented when validation fails

requirements.text: Update ReelUploadForm component to display user-friendly error messages when description content validation fails
acceptanceCriteria: Validation errors are displayed clearly to users
Error messages guide users to correct their description
Upload submission is prevented when validation fails

constraints: Content moderation must not modify or censor user content, only accept or reject it
Validation must occur on the backend to ensure security
Error messages must be respectful and constructive
nonGoals: Creating an admin dashboard for content review
